## ECSComponent() function

组件类型装饰器 用于为组件类指定固定的类型名称，避免在代码混淆后失效

**Signature:**

```text
export declare function ECSComponent(typeName&#58; string): <T extends new (...args&#58; any[]) => Component>(target: T) => T;
```

## Parameters

<table><thead><tr><th>

</th><th>

Type


</th><th>

Description


</th></tr></thead>
<tbody><tr><td>

typeName


</td><td>

string


</td><td>

组件类型名称


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>

**Returns:**

&lt;T extends new (...args: any\[\]) =\> [Component](./ecs-framework-monorepo.component.md)<!-- -->\>(target: T) =\> T

## Example


```text
@ECSComponent('Position')
class PositionComponent extends Component {
    x&#58; number = 0;
    y&#58; number = 0;
}
```
